column1:
BringBackCastle,"2022-05-20T22:04:41.1Z","A good set with a lot of play value","

Minifigure:

column2: s a bit generic but comes with a helmet in a lovely shade of dark red.

column1: You get two monkeys and a scorpion with this set which is pretty good in my opinion. The monkeys are able to hold things and can attach
column2: multiple ways to the provided tree. The scorpion is ok but provides good play value.

column1: The provided tree is fine, but I think it should have been extended a bit to make it taller. This modification is easy enough to make, however, and the tree has a variety of good vantage points for the monkeys.
The ATV is nice as the wheels can move slightly from side to side, a feature that is great for play value.
The drone looks nice for its simplicity and comes with a cool camera accessory.
I like this set and I think it provides pretty good play value for its price.&nbsp
